text: South West Trains was a train company in the United Kingdom. It served 213 stations and ran 185 of those. The company had 371 trains and ran the Island Line as well. In August 2017, South Western Railway took over the franchise.First MTR South Western Trains Limited wins South Western franchise Department for Transport 27 March 2017Improving South Western Railway FirstGroup plc, 27 March 2017 ==References== Category:Post-privatisation British railway companies Category:2017 disestablishments in Europe Category:Defunct companies of the United Kingdom
title: South West Trains
